entry.title: Post-Brexit Turmoil, Inflation, EnergyPose Tests for Johnson's Successor
entry.content: Brexit has been a chronic drag on British growth, compounding the pain of inflation that is the highest among the G-7 economies

entry.title: Russia Says It Is Open to Talks With Ukraine, Turkey on Grain Exports
entry.content: Comments from Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov came as his Ukrainian counterpart said a Russian naval blockade on Ukraine has “shredded global chains of food supply.”

entry.title: José Eduardo dos Santos, Autocrat Who Led Angola, Dies
entry.content: The former president, who brutally crushed dissent during his 38 years in power as those around him grew rich, died in a hospital in Barcelona following a long illness.
